admin.historyPostDeleted: Reputation points decreased due to post deletion or hiding.
admin.historyPostCreated: Reputation points increased for creating a post.
admin.historyLikeSet: Reputation points increased for receiving a like.
admin.historyLikeUnset: Reputation points decreased for losing a like.
admin.historyBestAnswerSet: Reputation points increased for receiving a best answer.
admin.historyBestAnswerUnset: Reputation points decreased for unassigning a best answer.
admin.historyDiscussionCreated: Reputation points increased for starting a discussion.
admin.historyDiscussionClosed: Reputation points decreased because your thread was closed.

forum.reputationIncreasedNotification: Your reputation is rising! Keep up the good work!
forum.reputationDecreasedNotification: Oh no! Your reputation is decreasing!
forum.reputationHistoryPageTitle: This timeline displays the latest 15 events that impacted your reputation.
